mapper.select:
SELECT t1.alarmTime as alarmTime, t6.constantName as alarmLevel, t3.deviceName as deviceName, t2.alarmContent as alarmContent, t4.orgCode as orgCode, t4.orgName as orgName, t4.orgTel as orgTel, t4.orgAddr as orgAddr, t5.statusName as statusName from alarm_info_temp t1, alarm_def t2, sys_device t3, sys_orga t4, alarm_status t5, sys_constant t6 WHERE t1.statusId = '1' and t1.alarmDefId = t2.alarmDefId and t1.deviceId = t3.deviceId and t2.delFlag = '0' and t3.orgId = t4.id
and t4.orgCode = '${orgCode}'
and t4.delFlag = '0' and t6.kind = '29' and t2.alarmLvl = t6.constantValue and t1.statusId = t5.statusId

SELECT tp2.orgCode AS orgCode, tp2.orgName AS orgName, t1.alarmTime AS alarmTime, tp.constantName AS alarmLevel, tp2.deviceName AS deviceName, tp.alarmContent AS alarmContent, t5.statusName AS statusName, case t1.statusId when '1' then null when '2' then t1.handlerCode end as handlerCode, case t1.statusId when '1' then null when '2' then t7.userName end as handlerName, case t1.statusId when '1' then null when '2' then t1.handleTime end as handleTime FROM alarm_info t1, alarm_status t5, ( SELECT t2.alarmDefId AS alarmDefId, t2.alarmContent AS alarmContent, t6.constantName AS constantName, t6.constantValue AS constantValue FROM alarm_def t2, sys_constant t6 WHERE t6.kind = '29' AND t2.alarmLvl = t6.constantValue AND t2.delFlag = '0' ) tp, ( SELECT t4.id AS orgId, t4.orgCode AS orgCode, t4.orgName AS orgName, t3.deviceId AS deviceId, t3.deviceName AS deviceName FROM sys_device t3, sys_orga t4 WHERE t4.delFlag = '0' AND t3.orgId = t4.id ) tp2, sys_user t7 WHERE t1.alarmDefId = tp.alarmDefId AND t1.deviceId = tp2.deviceId AND t1.statusId = t5.statusId AND t7.delFlag = '0' AND ( t1.statusId = '1' OR ( t1.statusId = '2' and (t1.handlerCode = 'admin' or(t1.handlerCode <> 'admin' and t7.accName = t1.handlerCode ))))
and tp2.orgName like '%${orgName}%'
and tp2.orgId = t7.orgId
and tp2.orgCode = '${orgCode}'
and t1.alarmTime >= '${startDate}'
and t1.alarmTime <= '${endDate}'
group by t1.alarmId ORDER BY t1.statusId ASC, tp.constantValue ASC, t1.alarmTime DESC, tp2.orgCode ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO alarm_info_temp (deviceId, alarmDefId, statusId, alarmTime ) VALUES
(#{map.deviceId}, (SELECT alarmDefId FROM alarm_def WHERE alarmKind = #{map.constantKind} AND position = #{map.constantValue} AND delFlag = '0' ), '1', DATE_FORMAT(#{map.time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )

INSERT INTO alarm_info (deviceId, alarmDefId, statusId, alarmTime, createTime ) VALUES
(#{map.deviceId}, (SELECT alarmDefId FROM alarm_def WHERE alarmKind = #{map.constantKind} AND position = #{map.constantValue} AND delFlag = '0' ), '1', DATE_FORMAT(#{map.time},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )
